case_title: (Auqaf and Settlement), Board of Revenue DARHOON vs AULADI AND ANOTHER
appellant: (Auqaf and Settlement), Board of Revenue DARHOON

judgment_summary.appeal_against: Order of Additional Commissioner, Hyderabad Division dated 18-10-1981
judgment_summary.lease_status: Five years lease of petitioner cancelled
judgment_summary.main_contentions_petitioner: Entire area of 10-10 acres does not fall within 20 chains of village Urs Machi; policy conditions reserve land within 20 chains for village assaish; petitioner unable to substantiate claims with documentary proof.
judgment_summary.main_contentions_respondent: Entire grant of petitioner falls within 20 chains of village Urs Machi; Additional Commissioner rightly reserved land for village assaish.
judgment_summary.assistant_commissioner_report: Entire S. No. 289/2, 3 and 4 area of 10-10 acres falls within 20 chains of village Urs Machi; no other land available for petitioner.
judgment_summary.decision: No reason to interfere with the order of Additional Commissioner, Hyderabad.

land_details.location: Within 20 chains of village Urs Machi
